text:
Took 6-7 questions to find out whether the mala base is vegetarian or not even though i was asking Chinese to the stallholders who’s probably from China.

Decided to buy and asked how many people were in front of me - got 3-4 as an answer. But I waited for 20 mins, and I saw at least 5 dining in customers collected plus other grab food delivery orders.

Turns out my mala costed $17… It’s literally the same price as ordering the same things from Zhang Liang or Yang Guo Fu who are known for being expensive. Won’t patronise this stall again because of the price and not very nice service.

Used to patronize this stall often but standard kept dropping, portion became smaller and worst still, got multiple strands hair found inside the tomato grilled fish today. Showed to the staff and the female staff was unapologetic and nothing was done. Will not patronize again.

Standard variety of mala dishes
- nothing really stands out.

Food was so so
- meat was tough and tasteless
- seems like the dish was cooked together quickly

Service was decent, server was friendly

Koufu's air conditioning is cold
- bring a light jacket
Staffs not attentive, mala seem ok but ingredients seem not fresh, have some taste "weird", the only good is it is not cooked till very oily...
